Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • Search

  • public class Search
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains search algorithms (binary and linear) This class can sort an int, double or String array (array must be sorted for binary search)

    • Constructor Summary

      Search()

      Binary search for a sorted String array
      static int linearSearch(double[] array, double key)
      Search for a number in a double array (sequential search)
      static int linearSearch(int[] array, int key)
      Search for a number in an int array (sequential search)
